meanings.definition: A person who conducts scientific experiments.
meanings.sent1: The experimenters in the lab wore safety goggles.
meanings.sent2: The experimenters carefully recorded their findings.
meanings.sent3: The experimenters accidentally mixed up the chemicals and turned the lab purple!
meanings.sent4: The experimenters' curiosity led them to uncover new discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The experimenters' dedication to research was evident in their meticulous work.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in testing or trying out new ideas or methods.
meanings.sent1: The young experimenters were excited to test their homemade volcano.
meanings.sent2: The experienced experimenters shared their insights with the group.
meanings.sent3: The eager experimenters decided to test if cats really have nine lives.
meanings.sent4: The bold experimenters pushed the boundaries of what was thought possible.
meanings.sent5: The creative experimenters brainstormed innovative solutions to the problem.
